text: Barbara Florian (born 1931) is a retired Swedish film actress known for her work in Italian cinema.Small p.129 ==Selected filmography== * Il Diavolo in convento (1950) * Rome-Paris-Rome (1951) * Red Moon (1951) * I tre corsari (1952) * Girls Marked Danger (1952) * Jolanda, the Daughter of the Black Corsair (1952) * Altri tempi (1952) * Carcerato (1951) * First Love (1959) ==References== ==Bibliography== *Small, Pauline. Sophia Loren: Moulding the Star. Intellect Books, 2009. ==External links== * Category:1931 births Category:Living people Category:Swedish film actresses Category:Swedish emigrants to Italy Category:People from Stockholm
title: Barbara Florian
